casebody.data:
Hinderegger, Appellee, v. Dairy & Nutrition Council, Appellant.

[Cite as Hinderegger v. Dairy & Nutrition Council (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 7.]

*8(Nos. 94-74 and 94-75 Submitted October 25, 1994 Decided November 16, 1994.) Green, Haines, Sgambati, Murphy & Macala Co., L.P.A., Randall Vehar, Ronald G. Macala and Shawn C. Groff, for appellee. Frost & Jacobs, Thomas V. Williams and Laurie A. Belan, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals in case No. 94-74 is reversed on the authority of Bellian v. Bicron Corp. (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 517, 634 N.E.2d 608.

The discretionary appeal in case No. 94-75 is denied.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Wright, Resnick and F.E. Sweeney, JJ., concur. Douglas and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent.
